thread.title: McDonald’s serves up fresh beef in latest menu shake-up

title: McDonald’s serves up fresh beef in latest menu shake-up
text:
McDonald’s serves up fresh beef in latest menu shake-up 2:21pm EST - 01:22 
McDonald’s announces it has begun serving fresh, rather than frozen, beef Quarter Pounders and other premium burgers at about 3,500 restaurants, and is on track to do the same at the majority of their U.S. restaurants by early May.   
McDonald’s announces it has begun serving fresh, rather than frozen, beef Quarter Pounders and other premium burgers at about 3,500 restaurants, and is on track to do the same at the majority of their U.S. restaurants by early May.  //reut.rs/2I46TM5
